definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: But it's completely different, the moment of inertia, if you rotated it about this axis.
sentences.chinese: 但它完全不同，轉動慣量，如果將其繞這軸旋轉。

sentences.english: Almost all moment of inertia is in this system.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有這個系統中的轉動慣量。

sentences.english: So we know the moment of inertia.
the curl of a force field measures the torque per unit moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 力場的旋度是，描述扭轉力矩與轉動慣量比值的量。

sentences.english: You get a totally different moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 你會得到完全不同的轉動慣量。

sentences.english: What is the moment of inertia of that?
sentences.chinese: 它的轉動慣量是多少呢？

sentences.english: The low inertia DC drive motor is supplied by a quick thyristor unit.
sentences.chinese: 低慣量的直流傳動電動機由快速可控硅裝置供電。

sentences.english: Don't worry about moments of inertia about an arbitrary line.
sentences.chinese: 不需要對任意曲線，都找出它的轉動慣量。

sentences.english: The characters of border irrigation water flow movement of surface irrigation and its zero-inertia model have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了地面灌溉中畦灌水流運動的特性及零慣量模型。

sentences.english: A co-inertia analysis showed that species abundance and environmental variables had significant relationship.
sentences.chinese: 協慣量分析結果表明，相對丰度與環境變量顯著相關。

sentences.english: I have four objects here, and they all have different moments of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我這裏有四個物體，它們的轉動慣量也不同。

sentences.english: For the moment of inertia, we want the square of a distance to the axis of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 至於轉動慣量，要求的其實是到旋轉軸距離的平方。

sentences.english: That is how we define moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 這就是轉動慣量的定義方法。

sentences.english: Well, we will try to compute now the moment of inertia about this point.
sentences.chinese: 我們要去計算關於這個點的轉動慣量。

sentences.english: You can calculate the moment of inertia.
The application of a single-chip processor aided three wire pendulum experiment;
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種嵌入式三線擺轉動慣量測量系統。
